5805a81efbc024024d8172489dfdc6cf77879416.commitMessage: YARN-2404. Removed ApplicationAttemptState and ApplicationState class in RMStateStore. Contributed by Tsuyoshi OZAWA

subchanges.commitMessage: YARN-2404. Removed ApplicationAttemptState and ApplicationState class in RMStateStore. Contributed by Tsuyoshi OZAWA
subchanges.diff:
@@ -1,10 +1,5 @@
-  public void storeApplicationStateInternal(ApplicationId appId,
-                                     ApplicationStateData appStateData)
+  public void storeApplicationStateInternal(
+      ApplicationId appId, ApplicationStateData appState)
       throws Exception {
-    ApplicationState appState =
-        new ApplicationState(appStateData.getSubmitTime(),
-          appStateData.getStartTime(),
-          appStateData.getApplicationSubmissionContext(),
-          appStateData.getUser());
     state.appState.put(appId, appState);
   }
\ No newline at end of file
